attributes.action: Make the M20/A20 a Toll Road
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Thousands of foreign Trucks every month enter our country. Non of them spend any money in our country on Either Fuel, accomodation or food. These trucks contribute to damage to both the roads and the environment, with any repair costs being forced on us, the tax payer. I propose that any vehicle not carrying a UK Tax Disc, is subject to pay a toll on entry into the UK. The French do it, the Germans too, so lets get some contribution back into the UK!!
